00078 struct SC_API sc_curr_proc_info
00079 {
00080     sc_process_b*     process_handle;
00081     sc_curr_proc_kind kind;
00082     sc_curr_proc_info() : process_handle( 0 ), kind( SC_NO_PROC_ ) {}
00083 };

00094 enum sc_starvation_policy 
00095 {
00096     SC_EXIT_ON_STARVATION,
00097     SC_RUN_TO_TIME
00098 };
00099 extern SC_API void sc_start();
00100 extern SC_API void sc_start( const sc_time& duration, 
00101                       sc_starvation_policy p=SC_RUN_TO_TIME );
00102 inline void sc_start( int duration, sc_time_unit unit, 
00103                       sc_starvation_policy p=SC_RUN_TO_TIME )
00104 {
00105     sc_start( sc_time((double)duration,unit), p );
00106 }
00107 
00108 inline void sc_start( double duration, sc_time_unit unit, 
00109                       sc_starvation_policy p=SC_RUN_TO_TIME )
00110 {
00111     sc_start( sc_time(duration,unit), p );
00112 }

00177     {
00178        SC_SIGNAL_WRITE_CHECK_DISABLE_  = 0x0, // no multiple writer checks
00179        SC_SIGNAL_WRITE_CHECK_DEFAULT_  = 0x1, // default IEEE-1666 writer checks
00180        SC_SIGNAL_WRITE_CHECK_CONFLICT_ = 0x2  // only check for conflicting writes
00181     };

00410 
00411 // Not MT safe.
00412 
00413 #if 1
00414 extern SC_API sc_simcontext* sc_curr_simcontext;
00415 extern SC_API sc_simcontext* sc_default_global_context;
00416 
00417 inline sc_simcontext*
00418 sc_get_curr_simcontext()
00419 {
00420     if( sc_curr_simcontext == 0 ) {
00421         sc_default_global_context = new sc_simcontext;
00422         sc_curr_simcontext = sc_default_global_context;
00423     }
00424     return sc_curr_simcontext;
00425 }
00426 #else
00427     extern SC_API sc_simcontext* sc_get_curr_simcontext();
00428 #endif // 0
00429 inline sc_status sc_get_status()
00430 {
00431     return sc_get_curr_simcontext()->get_status();
00432 }
00433

00436 
00437 inline
00438 bool
00439 sc_simcontext::elaboration_done() const
00440 {
00441     return m_elaboration_done;
00442 }
00443 
00444 
00445 inline sc_status sc_simcontext::get_status() const
00446 {
00447     return m_simulation_status != SC_RUNNING ? 
00448                   m_simulation_status :
00449                   (m_in_simulator_control ? SC_RUNNING : SC_PAUSED);
00450 }
00451 
00452 inline
00453 int
00454 sc_simcontext::sim_status() const
00455 {
00456     if( m_error ) {
00457         return SC_SIM_ERROR;
00458     }
00459     if( m_forced_stop ) {
00460         return SC_SIM_USER_STOP;
00461     }
00462     return SC_SIM_OK;
00463 }

00518 inline
00519 const sc_time&
00520 sc_simcontext::max_time() const
00521 {
00522     if ( m_max_time == SC_ZERO_TIME )
00523     {
00524         m_max_time = sc_time::from_value( ~sc_dt::UINT64_ZERO );
00525     }
00526     return m_max_time;
00527 }
00528 
00529 inline
00530 sc_dt::uint64
00531 sc_simcontext::change_stamp() const
00532 {
00533     return m_change_stamp;
00534 }
00535 
00536 inline sc_dt::uint64
00537 sc_simcontext::delta_count_at_current_time() const
00538 {
00539     return m_delta_count - m_initial_delta_count_at_current_time;
00540 }
00541 
00542 inline
00543 const sc_time&
00544 sc_simcontext::time_stamp() const
00545 {
00546     return m_curr_time;
00547 }
00548 
00549 
00550 inline 
00551 bool
00552 sc_simcontext::event_occurred(sc_dt::uint64 last_change_stamp) const
00553 {
00554     return m_change_stamp == last_change_stamp;
00555 }
00556 
00557 inline
00558 bool
00559 sc_simcontext::evaluation_phase() const
00560 {
00561     return (m_execution_phase == phase_evaluate) &&
00562            m_ready_to_simulate;
00563 }
00564 
00565 inline
00566 bool
00567 sc_simcontext::update_phase() const
00568 {
00569     return m_execution_phase == phase_update;
00570 }
00571 
00572 inline
00573 bool
00574 sc_simcontext::notify_phase() const
00575 {
00576     return m_execution_phase == phase_notify;
00577 }
00578 
00579 inline
00580 void
00581 sc_simcontext::set_error( sc_report* err )
00582 {
00583     delete m_error;
00584     m_error = err;
00585 }
00586 
00587 
00588 inline
00589 bool
00590 sc_simcontext::get_error()
00591 {
00592     return m_error != NULL;
00593 }
00594 
00595 inline
00596 int
00597 sc_simcontext::add_delta_event( sc_event* e )
00598 {
00599     m_delta_events.push_back( e );
00600     return static_cast<int>( m_delta_events.size() - 1 );
00601 }
00602 
00603 inline
00604 void
00605 sc_simcontext::add_timed_event( sc_event_timed* et )
00606 {
00607     m_timed_events->insert( et );
00608 }

00612 inline sc_process_b*
00613 sc_simcontext::get_current_writer() const
00614 {
00615     return m_current_writer;
00616 }
00617 
00618 inline bool
00619 sc_simcontext::write_check() const
00620 {
00621     return m_write_check != SC_SIGNAL_WRITE_CHECK_DISABLE_;
00622 }

00624 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00625 
00626 class sc_process_handle;
00627 SC_API sc_process_handle sc_get_current_process_handle();
00628 
00629 // Get the current object hierarchy context
00630 //
00631 // Returns a pointer the the sc_object (module or process) that
00632 // would become the parent object of a newly created element
00633 // of the SystemC object hierarchy, or NULL.
00634 //
00635 inline sc_object*
00636 sc_get_current_object()
00637 {
00638   return sc_get_curr_simcontext()->active_object();
00639 }
00640 
00641 inline
00642 sc_process_b*
00643 sc_get_current_process_b()
00644 {
00645     return sc_get_curr_simcontext()->get_curr_proc_info()->process_handle;
00646 }
00647 
00648 // THE FOLLOWING FUNCTION IS DEPRECATED IN 2.1
00649 extern SC_API sc_process_b* sc_get_curr_process_handle();
00650 
00651 inline
00652 sc_curr_proc_kind
00653 sc_get_curr_process_kind()
00654 {
00655     return sc_get_curr_simcontext()->get_curr_proc_info()->kind;
00656 }
00657 
00658 
00659 inline int sc_get_simulator_status()
00660 {
00661     return sc_get_curr_simcontext()->sim_status();
00662 }

00681 extern SC_API double sc_simulation_time();     // Current time in default time units.

00726 // Return indication if there are more processes to execute in this delta phase
00727 
00728 inline bool sc_pending_activity_at_current_time
00729   ( const sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext() )
00730 {
00731   return simc_p->pending_activity_at_current_time();
00732 }
00733 
00734 // Return indication if there are timed notifications in the future
00735 
00736 inline bool sc_pending_activity_at_future_time
00737   ( const sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext() )
00738 {
00739   sc_time ignored;
00740   return simc_p->next_time( ignored );
00741 }
00742 
00743 // Return indication if there are processes to run,
00744 // or notifications in the future
00745 
00746 inline bool sc_pending_activity
00747   ( const sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext() )
00748 {
00749   return sc_pending_activity_at_current_time( simc_p )
00750       || sc_pending_activity_at_future_time( simc_p );
00751 }
00752 
00753 SC_API sc_time
00754 sc_time_to_pending_activity
00755   ( const sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext() );
